title: Unique roman/stencil-type font. Please help!
content:
This is the font used on music producer Clams Casino's website (clammyclams.com). Would anybody be able to tell me what it is?  
Thanks!  
-B.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clams_casino_logo_5030.jpg)
author: bramrickett

comments.content: Where is the inquisition? If that isn’t a perfect example for outline theft.

On 30 Apr 2013 — 10:34am  
Jan wrote:

> Where is the inquisition? If that isn’t a perfect example for outline theft.

What makes you think Quinn is a plagiarist?

Do you think I'm soft on MyFonts because they make money selling fonts?  
FYI: [http://typophile.com/node/56010](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218/http:/typophile.com/node/56010 "http://typophile.com/node/56010")

If you suspect plagiarism please report it to MyFonts, and then please report back here. BTW it's nice that MyFonts has a reporting mechanism, eh? On Dafont for example the "moderators" are often the worst ones...  
 [http://www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=licinia\_aged](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218/http:/www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=licinia_aged "http://www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=licinia\_aged")  
 [http://www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=ballpark\_weiner&text=Fixed+B...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218/http:/www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=ballpark_weiner&text=Fixed+Barcelona "http://www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=ballpark\_weiner&text=Fixed+Barcelona")

So have you finally started caring about plagiarism, or are you pointing out an example simply to claim that plagiarism is OK?

hhp

> What makes you think Quinn is a plagiarist?

It looks a whole lot like Bauer Bodoni with a negativ stroke added and some mods.  
The designer’s other fonts (on MyFonts) are all geometric constructions which makes this one even more probable to not being drawn from scratch. Wouldn’t you agree? In other cases this would have made your nose tingle or something.

On 30 Apr 2013 — 2:54pm  
Jan wrote:

> It looks a whole lot like Bauer Bodoni with a negativ stroke added and some mods.  
> The designer’s other fonts (on MyFonts) are all geometric constructions which makes this one even more probable to not being drawn from scratch. Wouldn’t you agree? In other cases this would have made your nose tingle or something.

1) Show an overlay with Bauer Bodoni... like I did with Cuprum\* but you ignored (except I won't ignore you).  
2) Report it to MyFonts (and then please report back here).  
3) Please answer my other questions.

\* [http://typophile.com/node/99822](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218/http:/typophile.com/node/99822 "http://typophile.com/node/99822")

hhp
So, your nose doesn’t tingle? Not even a bit? You hound.

I love hounds. Weasels on the other hand...  
 [http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=weasel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713165218/http:/www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=weasel "http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=weasel")

hhp
I conclude: Your nose only tingles if you want it to. You weasel.
